## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                        | Type                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `props`  | `props`   |                                                    | `IProp[] \| string` | `undefined` |
| `tag`    | `tag`     | query selector for the component to apply props to | `string`            | `null`      |
